data.title: Shaanxi Railway Institute – Free
data.meta_description: Name of University is Shaanxi Railway Institute. Choose Study Program, Compare Tuition And Fees and Apply Online to Shaanxi Railway Institute. Chats online with university admissions officers on official pages of universities.
data.text:
About the university

~ €1,879 / year

Many years of training experience Care for international students High-quality education

Shaanxi Railway Engineering Vocational and Technical College was founded in 1973, the predecessor of the Ministry of Railways Weinan Railway Engineering School. 2002 by the Ministry of Railways was placed under the Shaanxi Provincial People's Government, in 2003 by the Shaanxi Provincial People's Government approval, the Ministry of Education for the record, reform and upgrading to specialist level of higher vocational and technical college. College of transportation and civil engineering as the mainstay, training railways, urban railways, roads, construction and other infrastructure construction management needs of technical and technical personnel, formed a college-level full-time higher vocational education, adult education , Short-term training and skills training identification combined with the pattern of running a school.

How to apply to the university

Choose a program

Press “Apply now” button

Send an application form

Complete admissions tasks

Go to study

To apply to Shaanxi Railway Institute follow these steps. To get more information about the university and the admissions process, you can use the live chat to contact a university representative.

Required documents for admission

When applying for admission to Shaanxi Railway Institute in China you should prepare all required documents. Request a list of necessary documents directly from a university, as it may vary for different countries. Using our live chat, you can also ask for sample documents.

Resume/CV (graduate, postgraduate)

Online Application form

Proof of fee payment

TOEFL Certificate

Application fee

Medical Certificate

IELTS Certificate

Passport

Declaration for financial support

Research proposal outline (MA, PhD)

Health and Life Insurance

Student visa

Photographs

Why people choose this university

Many years of training experience Care for international students High-quality education

Free Apply is not responsible for the content of this page. Through the Site, Free Apply provides an online catalog which you can use to find different types of educational institutions. It’s possible for a new university to be registered by any user, however only verified university representatives will be able to manage, reply in chat and make changes to a university page. Once the University registers its official representative, it has the right to block access for others to edit the information. Further control over the content will be carried out by the representative of the University. Registration with the Free-Apply.com catalog is free.
